title._content: [Portrait of Joe Mooney, Andy Fitzgerald, Gaeton (Gate) Frega, and Jack Hotop, Decca studio, New York, N.Y., ca. Dec. 1946] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Joe Mooney, Andy Fitzgerald, Gaeton (Gate) Frega, and Jack Hotop, Decca studio, New York, N.Y., ca. Dec. 1946] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 235 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Mooney, Joe, 1911-1975 Fitzgerald, Andy Frega, Gaeton (Gate) Hotop, Jack Joe Mooney Quartet Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Accordionists--1940-1950. Clarinetists--1940-1950. Guitarists--1940-1950. Double bassists--1940-1950. Decca studio Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig...
